resources.string: The state log information (non real time log) needs to be manually opened and closed each time, and the corresponding log is grabbed.
It is about to clear all the log information on SD card and close all log switches. If you need to grab log, please manually open the corresponding log switch. Do you confirm?
No SD card, please insert SD card, reboot and configure Log switch.！
All Log files have been deleted successfully！
The Log file is being deleted\u2026
SD card path error, please confirm whether to insert the SD card in the configuration path. (default is external SD card)
Successful path switching of SD card
SD card path switch failed. Please confirm whether SD card exists！
